CustomField.formula: VIP_Dinner_2024_Ticket__c * 0 + X21st_Century_2024_Ticket__c * 0 + Community_Schools_101_Training_Ticket__c * 0 + Community_Schools_Conference_2024_Ticket__c * 250 + Schools_Out_Fri_Sat_2024_Ticket__c * IF(TEXT(Active_Membership__c) = "Yes", 280, 300) + Schools_Out_Fri_2024_Ticket__c * IF(TEXT(Active_Membership__c) = "Yes", 165, 185) + Schools_Out_Saturday_2024_Ticket__c * IF(TEXT(Active_Membership__c) = "Yes", 165, 185) + Site_Visit_Martin_Luther_2024__c * 50 + Site_Visit_Hamilton_Elementary__c * 50 + Site_Visit_Paige_Elementary__c * 50 + Site_Visit_William_C_Keane__c * 50
CustomField.label: Total Due
